committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to improve Native Hawaiian education programs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Native Hawaiian Education Reauthorization Act - Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to revise title IX part B (Native Hawaiian Education) to replace a series of categorical programs serving Native Hawaiian children and adults with a single authority for the Secretary to assist such program activities.Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to improve Native Hawaiian education programs, and for other purposes.
